reviews.review: атличная игра всем советую класная стрелялка люблю стрелять в людей

CS:GO is a great free to play FPS to play alone or with your friends, although if you are looking to play the competitive side of CS:GO free to play is not a option with the vast amount of hackers you will encounter. Overall it's a great game with some flaws and the prime is definitely worth it!

You make nice friends here but few are Worth Life Time as I got some Nice people to play with..

Great Communication, Great Skills needed, n challenge is full spirit

a good game, don't really find that many cheaters now 

would recomend
